tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I went to Dr Sanjay for wisdom tooth extraction, general dental checkup, and dental fillings. Dr Sanjay is a master of work. His patience with my endless questions was the best part about him. The treatment was also quite smooth, and he supported me with follow ups as needed. The other great thing about him is the minimalistic approach. Even when I pressed on about various possible treatments for minor issues, he infact denied all of them and suggested only what's necessary. I am filled with gratitude for dentists like him as I write this.

I haven't been very careful with my teeth since childhood, but I now realise the grave error in that. Thankfully with the help of all this modern technology and the expertise of dentists like Dr Sanjay, I have gotten a second chance. To all the dentists like Dr Sanjay, I hope you know that your work is important and has a great impact on people's lives for the better. Thank you for all your help.
The doctor is very patient and talks politely.  The staff were very friendly and gentle. I highly recommend Dr. Sanjay for anyone seeking gentle dental care

Good experience, short visit for gum pain and inflammation

Careful treatment in pregnancy 

Would recommend him

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Really good experience! Will visit again for further treatments. I highly recommend this doctor to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: The Doctor is very friendly. He explained very nicely about my dental problems. I am really satisfied with his work and I would like to recommend Dr Sanjay to everyone who is having any tooth related issues. I am sure Dr Sanjay will really meet your expectations and you are bound to have a great experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am giving this feedback after 3 months as I didn't want to do that without an observation period.
My 2nd molar crown had to be re-fixed. I had pain and gum swelling because of that. I approached two other dentists and both advised me for removal of the tooth and go for an implant instead of doing a new crown.  I didn't want to lose my natural tooth hence approached Dr. Sanjay Kaul. One of my friend had recommended him for second opinion before going for implant.
I am glad to say, Dr. Sanjay Kaul ensured my natural tooth wasn't extracted and did a successful RC followed by crowing. I have no problems in last 3 months and i am sure there will not be any in near future.
Basically a good experience.
